title: Interesting place to visit
text: A lot of ancient ruins to see. There is the tower of the wind, very good preserved, it's a octogonal monument, with water clock, sun dial and weather vane and many many more. Great place to see if you like Greek histroy. TIP: buy combine ticket if you want to save some money. It costs 30€ for 7 atractions including Acropolis. For children younger then 16 years is free with parents

title: Fabulous view to Athens
text: Everyone who want to see different view of Athens need to climb to Mount Lycabettus. Fantastic view to whole city. I was there after 17.00h and there was really refreshing breeze although it was August.Two way to go there. By foot and with cable car. If you choose cable car you will get to top in few minutes. By foot it takes arround 15-25 min. depend on your speed. Place you need to visit.

title: Fantastic experience
text: Perfect place to visit in Athens, any ages from younger to older people. Tip: try not to go in August because temperature is always over 37°C. You will burn on sun. One more tip, buy ticket for 7 main attractions for 30€, it will save you money and time, and for teens is free entry.

title: Christian beginning in Athens
text: A really well visited place. Many people don't know what actually happened here. This is the place where st. Paul has spoken to the Athenians first time and here was the beginning of the christianity in old Athens.

title: A look into the past.
text: If you want to see whole museum come at 10 in the morning. It is very huge place with various atractions. You can see prehistoric dinosaurs, various animals, many interactive games which can occupy you whole day. Tip: use free map to find what you are looking for.

title: A fantastic experience
text: Really fantastic experience to watch biggest screen in UK in 3D. Superb sound and perfect image. Tip: buy a London pass, you will get a free ticket to watch IMAX movie. And many more discounts.
place: IMAX Theatre at The Science Museum London

title: fastest way to travel
text:
London Underground is very fast way to travel trough London, but first few days can be confusing. The best way for us was to use google map which realy helped us very much. When that fail you can use help from other people, everyone is ready to help you (if they know). Try to avoid rush hour when working people go home (between 17-19 h)
Everything is full than.

title: Ivica P.
text: Excellent and friendly staff, very clean and lovely apartment, close to the train and bus station and approximately 10 minutes from London Bridge station . Excellent choice for anyone who want to enjoy nature and historical monuments and want to sleep in a quiet place. *****
